alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:03PM CDT until May 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central St. Clair County in west central Missouri... Northeastern Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 603 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rich Hill, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walker, Schell City, Harwood and Taberville. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 105 and 106. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
